Method.name: TransCspName
CopyMenu
Method.Description:
Creates a new menu from an existing menu
origmenuid - the id of the original menu to copy from newname - the name for the newly created menu newcaption - the caption for the newly created menu newid - a reference pointer to the id of the newly created menu newsubmenuid - if not null, the newly created menu takes on this submenu instead of that of the original menu

Method.name: FindExecute
Method.Description: Find menus by cpation,name OR by submenuof.

Method.name: ImageEx
Method.Description:
Extended image.
Treat image property as an expression to be evaluated.
Formats include:
Literal : webemr/rb.gif
Function : $s(rs.GetDataByName("Type")="S":"webemr/super.gif",1:"webemr/other.gif")
ClassMethod : ##Class(web.SomeClass).GetImage(rs.GetDataByName("Type"))

Method.name: ShowBar
ShowBarJson
Method.Description: 把当前的菜单和子菜单显示出来 d ##Class(ext.websys.Menu).ShowBar(1) Index ^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf1",SubItemID,RowID) Index SubMenuOf1 On SubMenuOf, RowID; Index SubMenuOf2 On (SubMenuOf, Sequence, RowID); epr.groupsettings ^ooGroupSettingsI("GroupDRIndex", GroupDR, RowID) ^ooGroupSettingsI("GroupDRIndex",1,1) 使用树遍历方式 ShowBar 获取菜单 ShowBarSub 获取子菜单 ShowBarItem 获取菜单项
Method.Implementation:
//quit "[]" ;w "写菜单"_"
",! ;d ##Class(ext.websys.Menu).ShowBarJson(1) n (id, %session, %request) ;n myGroupID s myGroupID=%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPID") ;w "安全组："_myGroupID_" "_id_"
",! ;^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf1",1012) ;zhaocz 2011-06-21 add n ;n myAAttribute, myCaption, myConditionalExpression, myImage, myImgAttribute, myJavascriptFunction, myLinkUrl ;n myMenuName, myShortcutKey, myShowInNewWindow, myTarget, myType, myValueExpression, myjsfunction ;n myMenuObj ;n myChildFlag ;n myEprGSRowID, mySMRowID ;n myMenuCount, myMenuEnable, myMenuSeq, mySMSeq, myhref ;n myjosnstr s myEprGSRowID=$o(^ooGroupSettingsI("GroupDRIndex", myGroupID, 0)) q:(myEprGSRowID="") s mySMRowID=0 s myMenuCount=0 s mySMSeq=0 k myMenuArray ;生成索引号码 s mySMSeq=0 f { ;q:(+mySMRowID>0) s mySMSeq=$o(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf2",id,mySMSeq)) ;;Sequence q:(mySMSeq="") s mySMRowID=0 f { s mySMRowID=$o(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf2",id,mySMSeq, mySMRowID)) q:(mySMRowID="") s myMenuCount=myMenuCount+1 s myMenuArray(myMenuCount)=mySMRowID } } ;画出菜单 s mySMRowID=0 s myMenuSeq=0 k t ///画表的格式 ;w "",! s myjosnstr="" f{ ;q:(+myMenuSeq>1) s myMenuSeq=$o(myMenuArray(myMenuSeq)) q:(myMenuSeq="") s mySMRowID=$g(myMenuArray(myMenuSeq)) m t=^websys.TranslationD("MENU",+$g(%session.Data("LOGON.LANGID")),mySMRowID) ;m t=^websys.TranslationD("MENU",20,mySMRowID) s myMenuObj=##Class(websys.Menu).%OpenId(mySMRowID,0) i $IsObject(myMenuObj){ s myMenuName= myMenuObj.Name ;$p($g(^websys.MenuD(mySMRowID)),"^") s myCaption = myMenuObj.Caption s myShortcutKey = myMenuObj.ShortcutKey s myTarget = myMenuObj.Target s myCaption = myMenuObj.Caption ;s myCaption= s myConditionalExpression = myMenuObj.ConditionalExpression s myImage = myMenuObj.Image i (myImage'=""){ s:(($e(myImage,1)="/")||($e(myImage,1)="\")) myImage=$e(myImage,2,$l(myImage)) s myImage=$tr(myImage,"\","/") s myImage="../images/"_myImage } s myLinkUrl = myMenuObj.LinkUrl s myShowInNewWindow = myMenuObj.ShowInNewWindow s myType = myMenuObj.Type s myValueExpression = myMenuObj.ValueExpression s myJavascriptFunction = myMenuObj.JavascriptFunction s myValueExpression = myMenuObj.ValueExpression ;判断是否有子菜单 if ((myLinkUrl="")){ s myChildFlag=1 }else{ s myChildFlag=0 } s myValueExpression=myMenuObj.EvaluateValue() ;$p(myValueExpression,"""",2) i (+myChildFlag'=0){ s myhref="" }else{ s myhref = ##class(ext.websys.Menu).getMenuLinkURL(myMenuObj,mySMRowID) ;s myPAGID=$i(^websys.Counters("tpagid")) ;s myhref="ext.websys.csp?a=a"_myValueExpression_"&TMENU="_mySMRowID_"&TPAGID="_myPAGID } s myAAttribute="" s myjsfunction="" ;执行Function 执行JavaScript还是执行CSP有一个判断 i (myJavascriptFunction'=""){ s myjsfunction="javascript:"_myJavascriptFunction_"('"_myhref_"', '');" ;s myAAttribute="javascript:"_myJavascriptFunction_"('"_myhref_"', '');" s myAAttribute="" b ;; }else{ ;; href="""_myhref_""" s myAAttribute=myhref ;连接 if (myTarget'=""){ ;s myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" target="""_myTarget_"""" ;定义目标 }else{ i (myhref'="#"){ ;s myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" target=""TRAK_main""" ;定义目标 } } } ;s:(myCaption'="") myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" title="_myCaption_"" ;定义标题 ;定义快捷键 ;s:(myShortcutKey'="") myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" accesskey="_myShortcutKey ;定义图像 s myImgAttribute="../images/websys/blank.gif" s myImgAttribute="" s:(myImage'="") myImgAttribute=myImage n val s myMenuEnable=..GetMenuSecurity(mySMRowID) if (+myMenuEnable){ s val=myMenuEnable if (myMenuObj.ConditionalExpression'=""){ d ##class(websys.Conversions).expressionExecute(myMenuObj.ConditionalExpression) } s myMenuEnable=val } if (+myMenuEnable){ ;输出当前行 ;w ""_ "",! s:(myjosnstr'="") myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"," set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"{" set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""id"":"""_""_mySMRowID_""",""text"":"""_myCaption_"""," ;; i (myAAttribute'=""){ set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""href"":"""_myAAttribute_"""," } set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""hrefTarget"":"""_$s(myTarget'="":myTarget,1:"TRAK_main")_"""," set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""icon"":"""_myImgAttribute_"""," set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""cls"":"""_myjsfunction_"""," ;,""cls"":""forum"" i (+myChildFlag'=0)&&(+$d(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf1",mySMRowID))){ set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""leaf"":false" }else{ set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"""leaf"":true" } set myjosnstr=myjosnstr_"}" ;&&(+$d(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf1",mySMRowID))) ;d ..ShowBarSubExpJson(mySMRowID,myMenuSeq, -1, myMenuSeq) ;b ;;; } d myMenuObj.%Close() } } k myMenuArray s myjosnstr="["_myjosnstr_"]" q myjosnstr
",! ;w "" ;w myImgAttribute ;w myCaption ;_mySMRowID_" 序号："_myMenuSeq ;w "",! ;w "

Method.name: GetMainMenuJosn
Method.Implementation:
; zhaocz 2011-06-21 修正 n n (%session, %request)
s menu=##Class(epr.GroupSettings).GetMainMenu(%session.Get("LOGON.GROUPID"),.swf) i menu="" ; s myjsonstr=##Class(ext.websys.Menu).ShowToolBarJosn(menu) q myjsonstr

Method.name: ShowToolBarJosn
Method.Implementation:
;d ##class(ext.websys.Menu).ShowToolBarJosn(1073) n (id, %session, %request) s myGroupID=%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPID") ;w "安全组："_myGroupID_" "_id_"
",! ;^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf1",1012) s myEprGSRowID=$o(^ooGroupSettingsI("GroupDRIndex", myGroupID, 0)) q:(myEprGSRowID="") s myEGSObj=##class(epr.GroupSettings).%OpenId(myEprGSRowID, 0) s myGroupMenuSecurity = myEGSObj.MenuSecurity d myEGSObj.%Close() s mySMRowID=0 s myMenuCount=0 s mySMSeq=0 k myMenuArray s mymjosnstr="" s mySMSeq=0 f { s mySMSeq=$o(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf2",id,mySMSeq)) ;;Sequence q:(mySMSeq="") s mySMRowID=0 f { s mySMRowID=$o(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf2",id,mySMSeq, mySMRowID)) q:(mySMRowID="") s myMenuCount=myMenuCount+1 s myMenuArray(myMenuCount)=mySMRowID } } s myMenuSeq=0 s mySMRowID="" f{ ;q:(+myMenuSeq>1) s myMenuSeq=$o(myMenuArray(myMenuSeq)) q:(myMenuSeq="") s mySMRowID=$g(myMenuArray(myMenuSeq)) ;;s myMenuEnable=..GetMenuSecurity(mySMRowID) s myMenuEnable=0 s myMenuSecurity=myGroupMenuSecurity ;$g(%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPMENUS")) i myMenuSecurity="" s myMenuEnable=0 i 1 e i $zbitlen(myMenuSecurity)

Method.name: ShowToolBar
Method.Description: Displays a menu across the page. 本方法被用来显示头菜单 ext.epr.menu.csp 步骤：1. 取出本安全组的头菜单授权 2. 取出id 的子菜单 3. 画出菜单
Method.Implementation:
;d ##class(ext.websys.Menu).ShowToolBar(1073) ;d ##class(websys.Menu).ShowToolBar(id) ;q s myGroupID=%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPID") ;w "安全组："_myGroupID_" "_id_"
",! ;^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf1",1012) s myEprGSRowID=$o(^ooGroupSettingsI("GroupDRIndex", myGroupID, 0)) q:(myEprGSRowID="") s myEGSObj=##class(epr.GroupSettings).%OpenId(myEprGSRowID, 0) s myGroupMenuSecurity = myEGSObj.MenuSecurity d myEGSObj.%Close() s mySMRowID=0 s myMenuCount=0 s mySMSeq=0 k myMenuArray s mySMSeq=0 f { s mySMSeq=$o(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf2",id,mySMSeq)) ;;Sequence q:(mySMSeq="") s mySMRowID=0 f { s mySMRowID=$o(^websys.MenuI("SubMenuOf2",id,mySMSeq, mySMRowID)) q:(mySMRowID="") s myMenuCount=myMenuCount+1 s myMenuArray(myMenuCount)=mySMRowID } } w "",! w "",! s myMenuSeq=0 s mySMRowID="" f{ ;q:(+myMenuSeq>1) s myMenuSeq=$o(myMenuArray(myMenuSeq)) q:(myMenuSeq="") s mySMRowID=$g(myMenuArray(myMenuSeq)) ;;s myMenuEnable=..GetMenuSecurity(mySMRowID) s myMenuEnable=0 s myMenuSecurity=myGroupMenuSecurity ;$g(%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPMENUS")) i myMenuSecurity="" s myMenuEnable=0 i 1 e i $zbitlen(myMenuSecurity)",! w "
",! ;

Method.name: ShowToolBarItem
Method.Implementation:
; top ; cnt ; menuid ; JSfiles k t s JSfiles="" m t=^websys.TranslationD("MENU",+$g(%session.Data("LOGON.LANGID")),menuid) s myMenuObj=##Class(websys.Menu).%OpenId(menuid,0) i $IsObject(myMenuObj){ s myMenuName= myMenuObj.Name ;$p($g(^websys.MenuD(mySMRowID)),"^") s myCaption = myMenuObj.Caption s myShortcutKey = myMenuObj.ShortcutKey s myTarget = myMenuObj.Target s myCaption = myMenuObj.Caption b ;;caption ;s myCaption= s myConditionalExpression = myMenuObj.ConditionalExpression s myImage = myMenuObj.Image i (myImage'=""){ s:(($e(myImage,1)="/")||($e(myImage,1)="\")) myImage=$e(myImage,2,$l(myImage)) s myImage=$tr(myImage,"\","/") s myImage="../images/"_myImage } s myLinkUrl = myMenuObj.LinkUrl s myShowInNewWindow = myMenuObj.ShowInNewWindow s myType = myMenuObj.Type s myValueExpression = myMenuObj.ValueExpression s myJavascriptFunction = myMenuObj.JavascriptFunction s myValueExpression = myMenuObj.ValueExpression s myValueExpression=myMenuObj.EvaluateValue() ;$p(myValueExpression,"""",2) ;s myPAGID=$i(^websys.Counters("tpagid")) ;s myhref="ext.websys.csp?a=a"_myValueExpression_"&TMENU="_menuid_"&TPAGID="_myPAGID s myhref = ##class(ext.websys.Menu).getMenuLinkURL(myMenuObj,menuid) s myAAttribute="" ;执行Function 执行JavaScript还是执行CSP有一个判断 i (myJavascriptFunction'=""){ s myAAttribute="href=""javascript:"_myJavascriptFunction_"('"_myhref_"', '');""" }else{ s myAAttribute="href="""_myhref_"""" ;连接 ;i (myhref="#"){ s myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" onclick=""SelectToolbar('tbi"_cnt_"');""" ;打开菜单 ;} if (myTarget'=""){ s myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" target="""_myTarget_"""" ;定义目标 }else{ i (myhref'="#"){ s myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" target=""TRAK_main""" ;定义目标 } } } s:(myCaption'="") myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" title="_myCaption_"" ;定义标题 s myShowShortcutKey="" ;定义快捷键 s:(myShortcutKey'="") myAAttribute=myAAttribute_" accesskey="_myShortcutKey s:(myShortcutKey'="") myShowShortcutKey=""_myShortcutKey_"" ;定义图像 s myImgAttribute="" s:(myImage'="") myImgAttribute="" ;输出当前行 w "",! w "" w myImgAttribute w myCaption_myShowShortcutKey ;_mySMRowID_" 序号："_myMenuSeq w "",! w "",! w "
" w "
" d myMenuObj.%Close() }

Method.name: XMLId
Method.Description: Get the ID from the identified by string. By default the generated version of this returns the value passed. In general this method will be overridden to provide the required behaviour. For example - Component name is passed - this will return ..%Id()

Query.name: Find
Query.Description: Find Menus by name and caption prefix OR by submenuof

Method.name: GetMenuSecurity
Method.Description: 获取菜单是否显示的权限 =0 不显示 =1 显示 保存的 选择项的最大RowID值，
Method.Implementation:
;zhaocz 2011-06-21 add n n myMenuSecurity, enabled
s enabled=0 s myMenuSecurity=$g(%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPMENUS")) i myMenuSecurity="" s enabled=0 i 1 e i $zbitlen(myMenuSecurity)<Id s enabled=0 i 1 e s enabled=$s($zbitget(myMenuSecurity,Id):1,1:0) q enabled
